patthana7.2:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:1.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:1.1_2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:1.1_3: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana7.2:1.1_5: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana7.2:1.1_7: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:1.1_8: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana7.2:1.1_9: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana7.2:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
